message.content:
cs.CV, cs.MM, cs.LG, cs.GR, cs.HC 

This paper deals with computer vision challenges related to image correspondence and segmentation, specifically for dual-lens smart phone portraits. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a joint fully connected conditional random field (CRF) framework, which involves machine learning and optimization techniques, making cs.MM (Machine Learning) and cs.LG (Learning) likely sub-categories as well. The use of regional correspondence to handle textureless regions in matching suggests that cs.GR (Graphics) could also be a relevant sub-category. Finally, since the paper focuses on improving the quality of portrait images, cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) could also be a possible sub-category.
